project_abstract.cdata: The project consists of the following components: (a) extension of the Pyong Taek Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG) receiving terminal; (b) construction of additional pipeline capacity to deliver the increased terminal throughput; and (c) utilization of consultants' services for the engineering of terminal extension and pipeline expansion. The terminal extension component comprises the installation of two 100,000 m3 LNG storage tanks and additional regasification and gas send-out facilities. The pipeline component expands the existing pipeline system covering the Seoul metropolitan area, and installs a trunkline from Pyong Taek to Jon to support natural gas market developments in the Central Region.
